blog.name: therealdoomsday
blog.title: TheRealDoomsday
blog.description: Instead of spending all your time trying to make things better and failing, you can cut out the middle man and just make things worse.

body:
You laugh, You Lose.

(A part out of my BTS AU fic)

We finish eating and clean up. Then the realization hits; we have absolutely nothing to do. No scheduled training or activities.

We all sat in the living room, looking at each other, trying to figure out what to do.

“We could play a sport?” Jungkook suggests and I shrug.

“Yeah, sure, we could go outside and play the sport-pall. Put a ball through a hoop; touch down, five points!” I say and Jungkook cocks an eyebrow at me.

“You know nothing about sport, do you?” Jungkook asks and I nod; “I know nothing about sport.” I say and he sighs, falling back against the couch.

“We could watch a series. What about that one you’re always mentioning, (y/n)?” Namjoon asks and I nod “Supernatural? Saving People, Hunting Things, Family Business.” I say with slight tears in my eyes.

“So much trauma.” I whisper and everyone looks at me, slightly concerned.

“Okay, okay, how about we do the try not to laugh challenge; with friends!” I say and they nod.

“Sure, what are the rules?” Jimin asks.

“Okay, so you laugh, you lose. Your friends have to do whatever they can to try and break you, to get you to laugh but they aren’t allowed to touch you. That would make it too easy.” I say and we all go into the kitchen.

We play rock/paper/scissors for who goes first. “I feel like I never actually win at this game.” Hoseok says as he goes to stand in the middle of the kitchen.

Jungkook starts pulling faces at Hoseok and I can see his cheeks twitching. I join Jungkook but eventually just shove him away, the completely over exaggerated look of offence on the youngest’s face make’s Hobi lose it and he starts laughing.

Seokjin takes his place. “Psh, stand back noobs, I got this.” I say and crack my knuckles. “What do you call a fake noodle?” Seokjin shrugs. “An Impasta.” I say dramatically and Jin Start’s laughing.

“That’s no fair! Everyone knows puns are my one weakness!” Jin says and pouts.

Jungkook takes his place. We try just about everything but Kook is staying stone-faced.

I hear Yoongi whisper “I can’t lose!” And suddenly he turns to me. “They almost had the gauntlet off.” Yoongi says and I sigh deeply.

“They almost had the gauntlet off. They almost had the gauntlet off. If QUILL WASN’T SUCH A MAJOR CACTUS, PARKER WOULDN’T BE DUST!” I start ranting and Jungkook laughs.

“‘Major cactus’, really?” He asks and I shrug.

Namjoon takes his place. Taehyung stands directly in front of Namjoon. “So I’m sitting there, barbeque sauce on my titties.” Tae says and Namjoon just about dies.

“No fair! Vines shouldn’t be allowed!” Namjoon says, laughing, and Jimin takes his place.

“Jimin..” I whisper. I can already see him struggling to keep it together. “Jiminiee…” I say and stand a bit closer. “Jiminiee I lov you..” I say and he breaks down into a fit of giggles.

“Ha! Giggling counts!” Yoongi says and Tae takes Jimin’s place.

We joke and mock and pull faces but Tae stands his ground, stone-faced. He usually laughs when someone has a undeniable voice crack.

“I know GD and I have tickets to his next concert.” I say and Jungkook basically falls over himself as he charges toward me, that alone sent Tae into a fit of giggles.

“YOU KNOW G-DRAGON?!” Kook basically shouts with a voice crack so high pitched, I thought the windows would shatter, his hands gripping my shoulders. Tae laughs and I point at him.

“You lose!” I say and turn to Jungkook. “Yes, I do, he’s serving his mandatory military service period with the agency.” I say and stand in the middle of the kitchen.

I concentrate hard and keep my composure despite the ridiculous things they’re whispering and yelling to me. Namjoon starts to do a weird dance and accidentally trips over a chair that seems to have appeared out of nowhere.

He falls on the chair, effectively breaking it and at that moment almost me. I let out a high pitched groan and clench my jaw.

“I have hate in my soul.” I whisper to myself.

Jin starts spitting Dad jokes, one after the other. I nearly cracked so many times, but 20 minutes in and I’m still going strong. Jin resorts to Knock Knock jokes.

“Knock knock!” He says and before I can even begin to reply, Yoongi speaks. “It’s open.” He says and I break. I laugh, I laugh until I can’t stand up straight, until I fall over.

Yoongi stands in my spot and we all work collectively against our greatest challenge.

Fifteen minutes in, I look up at Yoongi. “Looks like you might actually win.” I say and he smirks.

“What’s my prize?” Yoongi asks and I shrug “My hand in marriage?” I say with a questioning tone.

“Well, that’s not exactly a great prize.” He says and my mouth falls open. Yoongi stares at my shocked and offended expression and bursts out laughing. It takes me a moment to realize but once I do, I do a fist pump.

“I WON!” I say happily and clap my hands together harshly with a loud ’slap’ “Self five! Whoo!” I cheer and Yoongi rolls his eyes.

“You’re such a dork.” Namjoon says with a smile.

“Hey that’s my line!” I laugh.

“No fair! Vines shouldn’t be allowed!” Namjoon says, laughing, and Jimin takes his place.

“Jimin..” I whisper. I can already see him struggling to keep it together. “Jiminiee…” I say and stand a bit closer. “Jiminiee I lov you..” I say and he breaks down into a fit of giggles.

“Ha! Giggling counts!” Yoongi says and Tae takes Jimin’s place.

We joke and mock and pull faces but Tae stands his ground, stone-faced. He usually laughs when someone has a undeniable voice crack.

“I know GD and I have tickets to his next concert.” I say and Jungkook basically falls over himself as he charges toward me, that alone sent Tae into a fit of giggles.

“YOU KNOW G-DRAGON?!” Kook basically shouts with a voice crack so high pitched, I thought the windows would shatter, his hands gripping my shoulders. Tae laughs and I point at him.

“You lose!” I say and turn to Jungkook. “Yes, I do, he’s serving his mandatory military service period with the agency.” I say and stand in the middle of the kitchen.

I concentrate hard and keep my composure despite the ridiculous things they’re whispering and yelling to me. Namjoon starts to do a weird dance and accidentally trips over a chair that seems to have appeared out of nowhere.

He falls on the chair, effectively breaking it and at that moment almost me. I let out a high pitched groan and clench my jaw.

“I have hate in my soul.” I whisper to myself.

Jin starts spitting Dad jokes, one after the other. I nearly cracked so many times, but 20 minutes in and I’m still going strong. Jin resorts to Knock Knock jokes.

“Knock knock!” He says and before I can even begin to reply, Yoongi speaks. “It’s open.” He says and I break. I laugh, I laugh until I can’t stand up straight, until I fall over.

Yoongi stands in my spot and we all work collectively against our greatest challenge.

Fifteen minutes in, I look up at Yoongi. “Looks like you might actually win.” I say and he smirks.

“What’s my prize?” Yoongi asks and I shrug “My hand in marriage?” I say with a questioning tone.

“Well, that’s not exactly a great prize.” He says and my mouth falls open. Yoongi stares at my shocked and offended expression and bursts out laughing. It takes me a moment to realize but once I do, I do a fist pump.

“I WON!” I say happily and clap my hands together harshly with a loud ’slap’ “Self five! Whoo!” I cheer and Yoongi rolls his eyes.

“You’re such a dork.” Namjoon says with a smile.

“Hey that’s my line!” I laugh.

tags: it's dangerous to have a beauty standard that cannot be reached by regular people
and it took me a while to realize that
this doesn't only apply to bts of course
i hope no one gets butthurt
summary: when i see people saying that BTS members are always so effortlessly beautiful, it makes me kind of uneasy. yes, yes they are...
body:
when i see people saying that BTS members are always so effortlessly beautiful, it makes me kind of uneasy. yes, yes they are very beautiful, but they also have a whole TEAM of people who make sure they look like that. their looks are definitely not always effortless.

they have resources dedicated specifically to maintaining their image, mainly time and money. they have people taking care of their hair, skin, makeup and clothes. over the years, they know what works for the camera. it’s a part of their job to look good.

again, i’m not saying in the slightest that they are not beautiful. i’m just saying a lot more effort goes into their appearance than what we actually see.
